Name: South Beach
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An unusual bittersweet combination with a strong orange and almond flavour.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1992 by Dale DeGroff in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of South Beach contains 160 calories
